content: offering an instant pdf crochet pattern to make a gorgeous and easy baby afghan offers full and complete instructions to make this bright and cheerful afghan approximate finished size will be 28 x 28 the pattern will be available for you to download in pdf format directly after your payment is received materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook size i - tapestry needle pattern is written in english using standard american terms level beginner ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www crochet365knittoo com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
